author: wvalthar
title: @chain-lib Cardano API Plugins
description: Current chain-lib/cardano-api only lets users use blockfrost. A plugin system should be made to let anyone modify the program as needed.

author: wvalthar
title: @chainlib 0.0.x->1.x & nami tests
description: Current the chain-lib projects are 0.0.x. Make necessary updates to projects, which make programming with cardano easy, production-ready.

author: wvalthar
title: @chain-lib Documentation Website
description: Current chain-lib documentation is on github. This will be for creating a docusaurus website at the chain-lib.com website that we own.

author: matthiasksieber
title: Blace.io: Marketplace Creator ⚡
description: As marketplaces are being built, repeat work is being executed, cutting into the overall efficiency of developers.

author: hotspringfinder
title: Flutter SDK
description: Flutter is the fastest growing mobile app developer community but currently there's no Flutter library support in the Cardano ecosystem.

author: henno
title: Open Source for the environment
description:
Nature is an externality of our economic system.
The quicker we can take everything from nature, the more profitable we will be.

author: greg
title: Android SDK
description: Mobile devs who want to integrate Cardano, have to build their own replica of tools, which requires knowledge of cryptography.

author: highlander
title: Smart Contract Library - Phase 1
description: Cardano lacks an open source library of smart contracts that developers can use for rapid prototyping.

author: nvhieu
title: Localize Yoroi for Vietnam market
description: Yoroi has not been localized for the Vietnamese language. which leads to many mistakes and difficult use for Vietnamese

author: hungryproton
title: Procedural 3D content creation tool
description: There are limited solutions for real-time 3D procedural generation, that are Free and Open Source.

author: juliane
title: GMBL Turning Dev > Blockchain Devs
description: There are not enough Cardano blockchain developers to deliver on the tidal wave of work coming our way.

author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger CLI: ready2use outputs
description: gamechanger-dapp-cli tool is able to generate URL and QR codes, but it doesn't provide ready-to-integrate snippets for HTML, react, node...

author: raz
title: Fund7Proposals + SDGs - Cardano AIM
description: Connecting SDGs + Catalyst Proposals require analyses + evaluation.We ask for support to continue work in Fund 7 as we have done for Fund 6.

author: cole.vt
title: Proposal Framework Tool - AIM
description: Creating robust Catalyst proposals should be easier. +75% proposals don't win Catalyst funds costing assessors + proposers time + resources.

author: antoine
title: Cardano-L-EARN
description: The Cardano learning curve is very steep. Many want to learn but are severely limited by time, resources, and willpower.

author: smarlex
title: Glow Formal Verification Stage 2
description: Unverified smart contracts can lead to catastrophic consequences: data leaks, loss of assets, etc.

author: bwana
title: Cardano Linux Distro for SBCs
description: Third parties are vulnerabilities. Running a node is the answer but compromises resources on your computer. SBC nodes are the answer.

author: smarlex
title: Glow on the PAB
description: The Plutus language and toolchain are hard to use.

author: eli.j.selkin
title: PAB Container Log Processor
description: Currently, the PAB has only the returns the Haskell unit () (returned as [] in JSON). This value is irrelevant to any frontend.

author: larde.victor
title: Open source scalable OST ecosystem
description: The spread of Contributionism and the success of OST plan will create a huge demand for town's personalized tools, owned by the community.

author: vivek
title: Dataset - Stake Pool Analytics
description: Full historical stake pool datasets for analysis and machine learning are currently not available through block explorers or existing sites

author: vivek
title: Dataset - Token / CNFT Analytics
description: Currently NFT data is disparate and lacking metadata standards, making it hard to query and gain insights from.

author: dcspark
title: Cardano Omnibus - UTXO Management
description: UTXO Management is handled sub-optimally by wallets, dApps & exchanges causing downtime, higher fees and degrades the user experience

author: armada.tmcc
title: Cardano blockchain data on BigQuery
description: Users hosting independent cardano-db-sync is a repeat process. A centralized database will eliminate redundancy and lower barriers to entry

author: reshm
title: NFT Based Authentication
description: The NFTs potential to act as means of authentication similar to the OAuth 2.0 Framework is still not being used.

author: felixweber
title: Ledger Live Integration
description: Ledger users need to rely on 3rd party wallets to manage their ADA, this causes confusion and increases the likelihood of users being hacked

author: mmahut
title: Open-sourcing Blockfrost API
description: Blockfrost is the most used API as a Service in the Cardano ecosystem trusted by thousands of developers, but it is not open source.

author: titan
title: Transaction Editor & wallet
description: The cardano CLI is to cumbersome to use on large & complex transactions

author: rcmorano
title: NFT-authorized NFT-minter contract
description: Currently there is no way to perform a decentralized, authorized, on-demand token minting from a smartcontract.
